onboarding.intro_subheader: Access all of your XMTP DMs—no matter where you started them.
onboarding.connect_subheader: Select a wallet account to use to create your XMTP identity. Then allow this app to connect to the account.
onboarding.create_subheader: An XMTP identity is like a messaging account. You'll create your XMTP identity using a wallet signature.
onboarding.creating_subheader: Click Sign to create your XMTP identity. Your signature proves that you own and control your XMTP identity.
onboarding.enable_subheader: Enabling your XMTP identity is like setting the password for your inbox.
onboarding.enabling_subheader: Click Sign to create your password. You'll be prompted to click Sign to provide it whenever you access your inbox.

messages.convos_empty_subheader: Start a conversation to get going with DMs that you own and control.
messages.messages_empty_cta_1_subheader: Message someone using their 0x wallet or domain address
messages.messages_empty_cta_2_header: Find the perfect apps for you
messages.messages_empty_cta_2_subheader: Explore a showcase of apps built with XMTP—all giving you access to your interoperable inbox
messages.messages_empty_cta_3_subheader: Learn how to build an app with XMTP
messages.address_field_prompt: Enter a 0x wallet or domain address
messages.address_field_loading: Finding address on the XMTP network...
messages.address_field_invalid: Please enter a valid 0x wallet or domain address
messages.address_field_not_on_network: Sorry, we can't message this address because its owner hasn't used it with XMTP yet
messages.conversation_start: This is the beginning of the conversation

status_messaging.error_1_header: Sorry, the app encountered an error
status_messaging.error_1_subheader: Not to worry. Let’s try again. If the error persists, <0>we're here to help!</0>

common.private_key_note: No private keys will be shared.
common.disconnect_tip: Tip: If clicking Disconnect wallet doesn’t disconnect your wallet, please use your wallet extension directly to disconnect from this app.
common.share_code: Share the power of the XMTP network with your friends, family and colleagues
